General.Name: Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: Syn Mun Kong Insurance Public Company Limited provides non-life insurance products in Thailand. It offers fire, marine and transportation, motor, personal accident, and miscellaneous insurance products. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
